my_favourite_bni_story: Joining BNI has been one of the most rewarding decisions in my business journey. While referrals and growth are important, what truly stands out to me is the bond I've built with fellow BNI members. From day one, I felt welcomed not just as a business owner but as a person. Over time, these connections turned into real friendships — people I trust, learn from, and laugh with. Whether it's support during challenges or celebrating each other’s wins, the BNI community has become like a second family to me. One of my favourite moments was when multiple members came together to support a bulk order I received — not only did they refer me, they helped me fulfill it successfully. That kind of unity and trust is hard to find elsewhere.
